title: Georgia House - Day 26 (2026-03-03)
summary:
Overview:
The Georgia House session on 2026-03-03 (Day 26) covered the introduction of several notable bills, including HB 416, HB413, and SB 420. The session featured a scripture reading and prayer by Rep. Sharon Cooper's colleague and friend, Mac Jackson, as well as some discussion around the importance of walking with God and blessing others.

Key Actions:
**HB 416**: [Bill description not provided]
**HB413**: [Bill description not provided] 
**SB 420**: [Bill description not provided]

Bills Introduced (First Reading):
- HB 416
- HB413
- SB 420

Notable Moments:
- Rep. Sharon Cooper introduced her friend and colleague, Mac Jackson, to deliver the opening scripture reading and prayer after the scheduled pastor could not attend.
- Mac Jackson's sermon focused on the story of Joseph from the Bible, emphasizing the importance of walking with God and blessing others, even in difficult circumstances.

Votes:
No recorded votes mentioned.

Attendance:
A quorum was present, as all members voted to signify their presence at the start of the session.

Adjournment:
The transcript does not explicitly state the time of adjournment or the date of the next session.
